description:
Application for minor material amendments (s73 of the Town and Country Planning Act (1990)) to vary conditions 2 (approved drawings) of planning permission ref.P000205 for "Redevelopment to provide a 600 seat Theatre, 72 residential units and 950sq. metres of A3 floorspace".  

The amended description proposed is " Redevelopment of the existing site to provide a new theatre comprised of the main auditorium with occupancy of up to 514 seats, ancillary theatre spaces, 72 residential units and 1,449sqm of flexible A1/A3/A4 space."
decision_conditions: In the absence of an appropriate S106 legal agreement the proposed development fails to mitigate its impacts to secure compliance with the Development Plan. In particular relating to the bringing forward the cultural (theatre) use, construction impacts, employment and training, education, highway works, delivery of accessible parking spaces, and travel planning.  The proposal is therefore contrary to the provisions of the National Planning Policy Framework (NPPF, 2018); London Plan (2016) policies 8.2, 7.2, 7.1, 6.13, 6.3, 5.18, 5.3, 4.12, 4.6, 3.1, 2.9 and Islington Core Strategy (2011) CS5, CS10, CS13, CS18 and Islington Development Management Policies (2013) DM2.2; DM4.4, DM12, DM7.4, DM8.2, DM8.5, DM9.2, and Islington's Planning Obligations (Section 106) SPD (2016).
